c1.name: Chained Reactions
c1.descriptionRaw: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>'s DMG.
c1.description: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

c2.name: Explosive Frags
c2.descriptionRaw: Being hit by <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color>'s mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.
c2.description: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

c3.name: Exquisite Compound
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Sparkly Explosion
c4.descriptionRaw: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.
c4.description: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

c5.name: Nova Burst
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Blazing Delight
c6.descriptionRaw:
While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
When <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> is used, all party members will gain a 10% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> for 25s.
c6.description:
While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.
